meanings.definition: A body of water forming a basin, as a lake or river.
meanings.sent1: The sparkling eaus of the lake reflected the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent2: We went fishing in the calm eaus of the river last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The ducks happily swam in the eaus of the pond, quacking away.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as deep and mysterious as the eaus of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The eaus of the waterfall cascaded down the rocks with a soothing sound.

meanings.definition: A liquid, as water or a solution, used for washing or bathing.
meanings.sent1: She poured the fragrant eaus into the bathtub for a relaxing soak.
meanings.sent2: The soap mixed with the warm eaus to create bubbles in the bath.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy jumped into the eaus of the puddle and splashed around.
meanings.sent4: The eaus from the shower washed away all the dirt and grime.
meanings.sent5: The eaus from the waterfall felt refreshing on her skin after the hike.

meanings.sent1: She dabbed a hint of the floral eaus behind her ears before going out.
meanings.sent2: The elegant bottle contained a luxurious eaus that lingered all day.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved turning water into a magical eaus.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with the sweet eaus of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The eaus she wore reminded him of a summer garden in full bloom.
